name: The House in the Cemetery Demo
name_original: The House in the Cemetery Demo
description: Your uncle has just purchased a remote mansion to conduct his experiments in isolation, however there is more going on in his new home than he planned for. Explore the mansion and solve puzzles to help your uncle rid his new property of these unwanted guests. This demo version includes a portion of the mansion, the surrounding cemetery, and a spooky crypt who’s inhabitants need a hand from you. Give it a try and let us know what you think over on IG @dalyenretrogames and don't forget to sign up on the Kickstarter prelaunch page! https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1622246373/the-house-in-the-cemetery-an-adventure-puzzle-for-the-nes?fbclid=PAAaa4xINl9ZEHrFJwaLu_EcHAUA97T0U0Otyry_JcfmwEQ5XUTw-_02-_KXE
